alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 3:51AM CDT until October 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations ranging from trace amounts to less than one inch and ice accumulations ranging from a few hundreths of an inch up to fifteen hundreths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Texas Panhandle and the Oklahoma Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
